ProductInfo.Features:
Adopts the standard Main profile H.264 compression technology, supports CIF/D1 recording, Network transmission, and playback simultaneously
Supports multiple operations: observe in real time, record, playback, backup, remote view via internet and mobile phone
Mobile phone surveillance (Win CE/Symbian/iPhone/Blackberry/Android)
Supports 4 channel audio input and 1 channel audio output
Recording Resolution:D1 (704 x 480), HD1 (704 x 240), CIF (352 x 240)
ProductInfo.Name: 4 Channel CCTV Surveillance Digital Video Recorder H.264 Security DVR w/ Internet Access, iPhone Blackberry, Android Smart Phone View (no HDD)
